reviews.text: We had dinner here last night as one of the first restaurant dinners after our baby girl has been born. It did not disappoint. The service was great and the food was a delight. We ordered the fish soup and clamp as a starter and both were amazing. We then got the charr and shrimps. We were a bit surprised that the 300 gram shrimp dish was served cold but the taste was amazing and the portion was quite large.

Located on the waterfront.The place has all glass walls so you get a nice view. They have a Full bar and the service was great. The waiter was very busy and he came over to the table constantly to check on us if there was anything we needed.  It has a good reputation for Salmon and Norwegian lobster. They were both delicious.

We definitely love the experience with Lofoten Fiskerestaurantâœ¨

I visited the restaurant with my family on a casual Saturday afternoon and was greeted with warmth by the staffs. The seafood we ordered were all very fresh and juicy and came with amazing flavor. The chef definitely knew how to present each of the dishes perfectly! The dishes were served with a comfortable pace that we all enjoyed.

Highly recommend the beer from the Oslo local brewery Schous! You wonâ€™t be disappointedðŸ˜Œ

Great Norwegian seafood does not exist without great service.

My first trip to Osolo and Lofoten completes my journey.

Seafood in its freshest state, cooked just right and experience elevated with dedicated server, Mr Marin.

Highly recommend to visitors of Oslo.

First choice during my stay in Oslo and spot on. The set recommended by the chef in the menu is truly perfectly selected. To start with, redfish ceviche with crab crisps, tickles the taste buds, then we get a great coconut soup with shrimps, the main course is a Norwegian specialty, oven-baked salmon served with blue shrimp and celery puree, and a mango dessert, the whole composition combines beautifully together and gives many taste sensations. We don't often come back to the same meals, but on the second visit the choice was the same. Really big applause ðŸ˜Ž
